mn87:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn87:3.3: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa gahapatissa ekaputtako piyo manāpo kālaṅkato hoti.
mn87:3.4: Tassa kālaṃkiriyāya neva kammantā paṭibhanti na bhattaṃ paṭibhāti.
mn87:3.7: Atha kho so gahapati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
mn87:3.9: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho taṃ gahapatiṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
mn87:3.10: “na kho te, gahapati, sake citte ṭhitassa indriyāni, atthi te indriyānaṃ aññathattan”ti.
mn87:3.12: mayhañhi, bhante, ekaputto piyo manāpo kālaṅkato.
mn87:3.13: Tassa kālaṃkiriyāya neva kammantā paṭibhanti, na bhattaṃ paṭibhāti.
mn87:3.20: Piyajātikā hi kho, bhante, ānandasomanassā piyappabhavikā”ti.
mn87:3.21: Atha kho so gahapati bhagavato bhāsitaṃ anabhinanditvā paṭikkositvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
mn87:4.1: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā akkhadhuttā bhagavato avidūre akkhehi dibbanti.
mn87:4.2: Atha kho so gahapati yena te akkhadhuttā tenupasaṅkami;
mn87:4.5: upasaṅkamitvā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃ.
mn87:4.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho maṃ, bhonto, samaṇo gotamo etadavoca:
mn87:4.7: ‘na kho te, gahapati, sake citte ṭhitassa indriyāni, atthi te indriyānaṃ aññathattan’ti.
mn87:4.8: Evaṃ vutte, ahaṃ, bhonto, samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ etadavocaṃ:
mn87:4.10: mayhañhi, bhante, ekaputtako piyo manāpo kālaṅkato.
mn87:4.11: Tassa kālaṅkiriyāya neva kammantā paṭibhanti, na bhattaṃ paṭibhāti.
mn87:4.18: Piyajātikā hi kho, bhante, ānandasomanassā piyappabhavikā’ti.
mn87:4.19: Atha khvāhaṃ, bhonto, samaṇassa gotamassa bhāsitaṃ anabhinanditvā paṭikkositvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamin”ti.
mn87:4.22: Atha kho so gahapati “sameti me akkhadhuttehī”ti pakkāmi.
mn87:4.23: Atha kho idaṃ kathāvatthu anupubbena rājantepuraṃ pāvisi.
mn87:5.1: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo mallikaṃ deviṃ āmantesi:
mn87:5.5: “Evameva panāyaṃ mallikā yaññadeva samaṇo gotamo bhāsati taṃ tadevassa abbhanumodati:
mn87:5.7: Seyyathāpi nāma, yaññadeva ācariyo antevāsissa bhāsati taṃ tadevassa antevāsī abbhanumodati:
mn87:5.9: Evameva kho tvaṃ, mallike, yaññadeva samaṇo gotamo bhāsati taṃ tadevassa abbhanumodasi:
mn87:6.1: Atha kho mallikā devī nāḷijaṅghaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ āmantesi:
mn87:6.3: upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandāhi, appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ puccha:
mn87:6.4: ‘mallikā, bhante, devī bhagavato pāde sirasā vandati, appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ pucchatī’ti;
mn87:6.6: ‘bhāsitā nu kho, bhante, bhagavatā esā vācā—
mn87:6.8: Yathā te bhagavā byākaroti taṃ sādhukaṃ uggahetvā mama āroceyyāsi.
mn87:6.10: “Evaṃ, bhotī”ti kho nāḷijaṅgho brāhmaṇo mallikāya deviyā paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
mn87:6.12: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
mn87:6.13: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho nāḷijaṅgho brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
mn87:6.14: “mallikā, bho gotama, devī bhoto gotamassa pāde sirasā vandati;
mn87:6.15: appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ pucchati;
mn87:6.17: ‘bhāsitā nu kho, bhante, bhagavatā esā vācā—
mn87:7.3: Tadamināpetaṃ, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā piyajātikā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā piyappabhavikā.
mn87:7.4: Bhūtapubbaṃ, brāhmaṇa, imissāyeva sāvatthiyā aññatarissā itthiyā mātā kālamakāsi.
mn87:7.5: Sā tassā kālakiriyāya ummattikā khittacittā rathikāya rathikaṃ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha:
mn87:7.6: ‘api me mātaraṃ addassatha, api me mātaraṃ addassathā’ti?
mn87:7.7: Imināpi kho etaṃ, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā piyajātikā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā piyappabhavikāti.
mn87:8.1: Bhūtapubbaṃ, brāhmaṇa, imissāyeva sāvatthiyā aññatarissā itthiyā pitā kālamakāsi …
mn87:8.7: Sā tassa kālakiriyāya ummattikā khittacittā rathikāya rathikaṃ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha:
mn87:8.8: ‘api me sāmikaṃ addassatha, api me sāmikaṃ addassathā’ti?
mn87:8.9: Imināpi kho etaṃ, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā piyajātikā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā piyappabhavikāti.
mn87:9.1: Bhūtapubbaṃ, brāhmaṇa, imissāyeva sāvatthiyā aññatarassa purisassa mātā kālamakāsi.
mn87:9.2: So tassā kālakiriyāya ummattako khittacitto rathikāya rathikaṃ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha:
mn87:9.3: ‘api me mātaraṃ addassatha, api me mātaraṃ addassathā’ti?
mn87:9.4: Imināpi kho etaṃ, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā piyajātikā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā piyappabhavikāti.
mn87:10.1: Bhūtapubbaṃ, brāhmaṇa, imissāyeva sāvatthiyā aññatarassa purisassa pitā kālamakāsi …
mn87:10.7: So tassā kālakiriyāya ummattako khittacitto rathikāya rathikaṃ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha:
mn87:10.8: ‘api me pajāpatiṃ addassatha, api me pajāpatiṃ addassathā’ti?
mn87:10.9: Imināpi kho etaṃ, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā piyajātikā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā piyappabhavikāti.
mn87:11.1: Bhūtapubbaṃ, brāhmaṇa, imissāyeva sāvatthiyā aññatarā itthī ñātikulaṃ agamāsi.
mn87:11.2: Tassā te ñātakā sāmikaṃ acchinditvā aññassa dātukāmā.
mn87:11.4: Atha kho sā itthī sāmikaṃ etadavoca:
mn87:11.5: ‘ime, maṃ, ayyaputta, ñātakā tvaṃ acchinditvā aññassa dātukāmā.
mn87:11.7: Atha kho so puriso taṃ itthiṃ dvidhā chetvā attānaṃ upphālesi:
mn87:11.9: Imināpi kho etaṃ, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā piyajātikā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā piyappabhavikā”ti.
mn87:12.1: Atha kho nāḷijaṅgho brāhmaṇo bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā yena mallikā devī tenupasaṅkami;
mn87:12.2: upasaṅkamitvā yāvatako ahosi bhagavatā saddhiṃ kathāsallāpo taṃ sabbaṃ mallikāya deviyā ārocesi.
mn87:12.3: Atha kho mallikā devī yena rājā pasenadi kosalo tenupasaṅkami;
mn87:13.1: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, mahārāja, piyā te vajirī kumārī”ti?
mn87:13.3: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, mahārāja, vajiriyā te kumāriyā vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjeyyuṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
mn87:13.4: “Vajiriyā me, mallike, kumāriyā vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā jīvitassapi siyā aññathattaṃ, kiṃ pana me na uppajjissanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
mn87:13.5: “Idaṃ kho taṃ, mahārāja, tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sandhāya bhāsitaṃ:
mn87:14.1: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, mahārāja, piyā te vāsabhā khattiyā”ti?
mn87:14.3: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, mahārāja, vāsabhāya te khattiyāya vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjeyyuṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
mn87:14.4: “Vāsabhāya me, mallike, khattiyāya vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā jīvitassapi siyā aññathattaṃ, kiṃ pana me na uppajjissanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
mn87:14.5: “Idaṃ kho taṃ, mahārāja, tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sandhāya bhāsitaṃ:
mn87:15.1: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, mahārāja, piyo te viṭaṭūbho senāpatī”ti?
mn87:15.3: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, mahārāja, viṭaṭūbhassa te senāpatissa vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjeyyuṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
mn87:15.4: “Viṭaṭūbhassa me, mallike, senāpatissa vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā jīvitassapi siyā aññathattaṃ, kiṃ pana me na uppajjissanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
mn87:15.5: “Idaṃ kho taṃ, mahārāja, tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sandhāya bhāsitaṃ:
mn87:16.1: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, mahārāja, piyā te ahan”ti?
mn87:16.3: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, mahārāja, mayhaṃ te vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjeyyuṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
mn87:16.4: “Tuyhañhi me, mallike, vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā jīvitassapi siyā aññathattaṃ, kiṃ pana me na uppajjissanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
mn87:16.5: “Idaṃ kho taṃ, mahārāja, tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sandhāya bhāsitaṃ:
mn87:17.1: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, mahārāja, piyā te kāsikosalā”ti?
mn87:17.3: Kāsikosalānaṃ, mallike, ānubhāvena kāsikacandanaṃ paccanubhoma, mālāgandhavilepanaṃ dhāremā”ti.
mn87:17.4: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, mahārāja, kāsikosalānaṃ te vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjeyyuṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
mn87:17.5: “Kāsikosalānañhi, mallike, vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā jīvitassapi siyā aññathattaṃ, kiṃ pana me na uppajjissanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
mn87:17.6: “Idaṃ kho taṃ, mahārāja, tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sandhāya bhāsitaṃ:
mn87:18.2: Yāvañca so bhagavā paññāya ativijjha maññe passati.
mn87:18.4: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā tikkhattuṃ udānaṃ udānesi:
